alert.note: Alert for Allen (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 07 at 8:06PM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Allen County through 730 PM CDT... At 706 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles southeast of Scottsville, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of southeastern Allen County, including the following locations... Forest Springs, Holland and Amos. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
